channel.title: [Oudated] Fullscreen toggle opposite of what it should be
channel.description:
####What happened? [img]/uploads/default/original/1X/3884611e91c140de4c6ed8193734beb8f0176763.png[/img]
[img]/uploads/default/original/1X/5193ca6f4ba435abb2831f09d8f16188944baef7.png[/img]
####What was SUPPOSED to happen? The fullscreen option should make the game fullscreen when checked and windowed when unchecked.
####Steps to reproduce: Run game in DX12, starting it non-windowed.
####Comments: Not sure if it works correctly starting in windowed mode.

item.title: [Oudated] Fullscreen toggle opposite of what it should be

item.title: [Oudated] Fullscreen toggle opposite of what it should be

item.description:
I could go back and forth between the two, but it simply did the opposite of what I had it set to

Read full topic

item.title: [Oudated] Fullscreen toggle opposite of what it should be
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
Try unchecking it then press apply. When it shows the pop-up “Keep settings” you will get your windowed game. However, it looks like you can’t go back to fullscreen. Also, this happens in every version.

Read full topic
item.source: [Oudated] Fullscreen toggle opposite of what it should be
